abstract: A look at Indian press coverage of important stories across the country.
snippet: A look at Indian press coverage of important stories across the country.
lead_paragraph: Jammu and Kashmir: Police on Thursday arrested two militants from the militant organization Lashkar-e-Taiba for twin blasts that occurred in Baramulla and Srinagar in August. The detainees, identified as residents of the Sopore district, are charged with killing two paramilitary personnel and a civilian in the Baramulla town and injuring 11 pedestrians in Srinagar (Kashmir Live).
